Function Documentation

bool isValidXMLTag ( const char *  str  ) 

This does a quick check to see whether a tag is valid XML.

It is not exhaustive. Rather we check to commonly allowed errors in tag names, and in particular tags beginning with numbers, tags containing spaces or slashes.

Parameters:
str The tag to check.
Returns:
False if the tag begins with a number or contains spaces, true otherwise.
